summary: A reboot of my current series on my youtube channel, please check it out cus its gonna be awesome. :)
descriptionHtml:
*UPDATE*
Part 1 is up so go check it out :P
[youtube]EhleVEOvFsg[/youtube]
[youtube]Y-sIkBY68a8[/youtube]
Youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/user/motorhead112

Altogether the series will never end because there is so much opportunity in the game even when there are no mods installed. If you want your mod featured in this series then please leave me a message. If you would like to create a thumbnail for the videos or a poster for my site or whatever then feel free :) put it in the comments below or message me a link and i'll check it out :)
More info for user requested mods in the forum on this post.
Just a lil more info on the series
- No loading screens
- No long boring  journeys
- Hunting all dragon preists
- Dawnguard, Dragonborn and Hearthfires DLC
- LOADS of mods
- No deaths
- Lots of exploring to be done
- Featuring requested mods 
- All guild quests
- 3 hours of gameplay has already been recorded
- Daily uploads

Here is very few of the mods installed:
Audio overhaul
Civil War Overhaul
Ashara Erin and Sienna Followers
Lush Trees and Grass
Birds and Flocks
Achieve That!
A Matter of Time
Dave the Talking Dragon Comanion PET
No Boring Sleep-Wait Menu
Skyrim Performance PLUS
SkyUI
Static Mesh Improvement Mod
Ultimate Follower Overhaul
Unlimited Bookshelves
W.A.T.E.R Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux
Dawbguard
Dragonborn
Hearthfires
RiverHelm
WhiterunVillageHome
Saturation Boost
Climates of Tamriel
RealisticWaterTwo
Skyrim Flora Overhaul
Wet and Cold
My Home Is Your Home
Ayu Follower
Pinewoods Cottage
Unofficial Skyrim Patch
Skyrim SKSE

Also follow me on Google+ to recieve upload updates and check out my Blog too where I post daily blogs!
